name: Slightly Heroes
description:
SUIT UP - Step into the role of your imaginary, half-baked superhero in this FREE MOVEMENT multiplayer VR shooter. Slightly Heroes is the newest game from the makers of Merry Snowballs.

BATTLE SOLO OR VERSUS FRIENDS
Experience real-time battles against players from all over the world or invite your friends to join a custom match and battle them across a variety of arenas. You can also challenge AI Heroes in order to train an improve your skills.

POWER-UPS
Discover fun power-ups and special weapons that add a creative twist to your attacks and that constantly change the rules of the battles.

COLLECT HEROES AND WEAPONS
Unlock a variety of charming characters and weapons with different attributes and play styles.

BECOME THE STAR PLAYER
Climb the global leaderboard to prove you’re the best imaginary Hero!

PLEASE NOTE! Slightly Heroes is a premium game, however the game includes DLC that can be purchased for real money.

Features:
- Free movement multiplayer action!
- Experience real-time 1v1 battles against players from all over the world.
- Unlock new, powerful Heroes and weapons that fits your playstyle!
- Battle solo or against friends.
- Climb to the top of the leaderboard in global rankings
